turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Frontier Village.
turn.2: Little is recognizable from its days as an amusement park, but items such as concrete boulders from the artificial river remain half-buried.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Some signage and ride vehicles have remained in the hands of private collectors, while other vehicles were stored at the nearby Happy Hollow Park & Zoo, to be sold later in 1980 at auction.
turn.5: Did anything happen after the auction?
turn.6: Frontier Village's narrow gauge train was bought by Jerry Burke who made it the central focus of his 10 acre themed 1880 Western themed Burke Junction shopping center in Cameron Park, CA. Singer-songwriter Jeff Larson talks about the park in the song *Frontier Village" on his 2018 album "Elua Aloha" with fellow singer songwriter Jeffrey Foskett.
turn.8: Since 2001 former employees and fans have held a reunion each summer at the Edenvale Garden Park, to reminisce about the park.
turn.9: What is the most interesting part of the article, to you?
turn.10: A residential development just west of Edenvale Garden Park is named "Frontier Village".
turn.11: Why did the development have that name?
turn.12: Shaughnessy McGehee of Campbell, California built a miniature version of the park in his own backyard over two decades.
